0.9.0.name: wordpress/ap-twitter-follow-button
0.9.0.description:
AP Twitter Follow Button add a widget which allows you to add a highly cutomizable Twitter Follow Button.

Features

  • [NEW] Option to set the alignment of the button
  • [NEW] Option to use iframe instead of Javascript
  • Option to choose the language of your button
  • Option to show the number of followers
  • Option to show the username
  • Option to activate the large button
  • Option to activate "Opt-out of tailoring Twitter"
  • Option to prevent the Twitter widgets.js javascript file from loading
  • Option to set a maximum width for your widget
